game.name: Alice Landing：愛莉絲迫降
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Alice Landing is a vertical scrolling, real-time reaction dodging game. Control Alice as she lands in city ravaged by totalitarianism and war, dodging obstacles, collecting scattered codons, following Alice searches for her brother, unlocks encyclopedia entries, and unravels the final secret.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Alice Landing is a vertical scrolling, real-time reaction dodging game. Control Alice as she lands in city ravaged by totalitarianism and war, dodging obstacles, collecting scattered codons, following Alice searches for her brother, unlocks encyclopedia entries, and unravels the final secret.
